data.eml:eml: The first goblin spiders of the genus Trilacuna from Vietnam (Araneae, Oonopidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tong, Yanfeng, Li, Shuqiang (2013): The first goblin spiders of the genus Trilacuna from Vietnam (Araneae, Oonopidae). Zootaxa 3709 (3): 277-284, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3709.3.6
